title: Closed the Call for Papers
brief: The time has come. We have closed the Call for paper. A big thanks to all of you, who have send us your Talk propososals. Watch your inbox, as our comitee will go through the submissions an will contact to very soon, with further details.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: The GDG DÃ¼sseldorf DevFest is coming up! 2014 we held a very popular "DevFest", 2015 we took a break - and now it is 2016 and we are back again!Mark the dates! #GDGDus will host Devfest2016, a developer conference, the weekend of October 22 and 23.We are looking motivated speakers for the conference, speakers who would like to share their wisdom on topics around modern development and/or various technologies with us. [Submit your Proposal](https://goo.gl/forms/ICJGuxERKkgMTh9J2). Call for Papers will end September 18!
